contents: Intro; Introduction; CHAPTER 1; What Is Graduate School?; Different Kinds of Higher Education; How Will Grad School Help Me?; When Should I Go to Grad School?; Why go to graduate school right after your B.A. or B.S.?; Why should I wait to attend graduate school?; Where Should I Go to Grad School?; Graduate School Myths: Debunked; Summary; CHAPTER 2; Planning Ahead; A Year at a Time: How to Prepare During Your Undergrad Years; Freshman year; Sophomore year; Junior year; Senior year -- fall semester; Senior year -- spring semester; Test Taking; What tests do I have to take?

When should I take these tests?Be Prepared: Studying for Your GRE; Researching Graduate Schools; Factors to consider when researching a grad school; Visiting Schools; Summary; CHAPTER 3; The Logistics of Applying to Graduate School; The Admissions Office Is Your Friend; What are qualities they looking for in my application?; Overcoming Problems With Your Application; What if my grades are bad?; What if my paperwork goes missing?; How do I know if the school has even received my application?; How do I check to see if my application is being considered?

What if you do not hear back from the college where you are applying?What do you do to make sure your application is at least being considered?; Summary; Chapter 4; How to Ace the Application; Writing Compelling Statements of Purpose, Letters of Intent, and Essays; How to make your statement of purpose interesting; Handy tips for writing your personal statement; Transcripts; Requesting Transcripts; Drafting Highly Effective Reference Letters; Whom to ask; When to ask; How to ask; Sample letter of request; The Personal Interview: How to Ace It; Potential questions during your interview
